English: (Buddhism) Pure Land, usually refers to Amitabha Buddha's Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss (Sukhavati in Sanskrit)

d.f: `佛國~`為~`清淨~`無~`濁~`之~`地~，`故~`稱~`為~「`淨土~」。`如~`西方極樂世界~`即~`阿彌陀佛~`淨土~。

English: (Buddhism) Pure Land, usually refers to Amitabha Buddha's Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss (Sukhavati in Sanskrit)
